name: Purpose
text:
This chapter shall be liberally construed and applied to promote its underlying purposes and policies, which are as follows:



	(1)	To simplify, clarify, and modernize the laws concerning the regulation, organization, management, and activities of financial institutions in this State; and
	(2)	To provide a comprehensive set of laws applicable to financial institutions. [L 1993, c 350, pt of §1]
